info.title: Course Management API
info.description: API for managing university courses and sections

post.description:
Create a new course

- **course_id**: Unique identifier for the course
- **title**: Title of the course
- **description**: Description of the course
- **instructor**: Course instructor name
- **credits**: Number of credits
- **department**: Department offering the course
- **is_core**: Whether it's a core course
- **level**: Course level (100, 200, etc.)
- **prerequisites**: List of prerequisite course IDs
- **categories**: List of category names
- **sections**: List of sections for this course

schema.title: Response 404 Create Course Courses  Post
Response 500 Create Course Courses  Post

get.description:
Get all courses with pagination

- **skip**: Number of records to skip
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return

schema.title: Skip
Limit
Response Read Courses Courses  Get
Response 404 Read Courses Courses  Get
Response 422 Read Courses Courses  Get
Response 409 Read Courses Courses  Get
Response 500 Read Courses Courses  Get

get.description:
Get a specific course by ID

- **course_id**: ID of the course to retrieve

schema.title: Course Id
Response 422 Read Course Courses  Course Id  Get
Response 409 Read Course Courses  Course Id  Get
Response 500 Read Course Courses  Course Id  Get

put.description:
Update a course

- **course_id**: ID of the course to update
- **course**: Updated course data

schema.title: Course Id
Response 409 Update Course Courses  Course Id  Put
Response 500 Update Course Courses  Course Id  Put

delete.description:
Delete a course

- **course_id**: ID of the course to delete

schema.title: Course Id
Response 422 Delete Course Courses  Course Id  Delete
Response 409 Delete Course Courses  Course Id  Delete
Response 500 Delete Course Courses  Course Id  Delete

get.description:
Search for courses based on various criteria.

- **query**: The search term
- **search_by**: Field to search in (all, title, description, instructor, department, course_id, category)

schema.title: Query
Search By

Response 409 Search Courses Courses Search  Get
Response 500 Search Courses Courses Search  Get

post.description:
Check if all prerequisites for a course have been met

- **course_id**: ID of the course to check prerequisites for
- **completed_courses**: List of completed course IDs

schema.title: Course Id
Completed Courses
Response Check Prerequisites Courses  Course Id  Check Prerequisites Post
Response 409 Check Prerequisites Courses  Course Id  Check Prerequisites Post
Response 500 Check Prerequisites Courses  Course Id  Check Prerequisites Post

post.description:
Create a new section for a course

- **course_id**: ID of the course to add section to
- **section_id**: Unique identifier for the section
- **instructor**: Section instructor
- **schedule_day**: Day of the week (Monday, Tuesday, etc.)
- **schedule_time**: Time of the class
- **capacity**: Maximum number of students

schema.title: Course Id
Response 500 Create Section Courses  Course Id  Sections  Post

get.description:
Get all sections for a course with pagination

- **course_id**: ID of the course to get sections for
- **skip**: Number of records to skip
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return
